questions.text: I have accumulated knowledge that others find valuable — people seek my expertise or perspective.
questions.principle: Knowledge becomes capital when others value it

questions.text: I have mental models and frameworks that help me navigate situations I haven't seen before.
I can teach or explain things in my areas of competence — my knowledge is organized enough to transfer.
I have intellectual reserves to draw on — I'm not always scrambling to figure things out from scratch.
My thinking has produced insights, systems, or content that has value beyond my personal use.
